 2018-04752018-05-01,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of SUROMITRA SANATANI of Edmonton, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
